titles.title: A resolution authorizing the Speaker to administer the oath of office to Representative Joseph E. Brennan from the State of Maine.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the Speaker of the House or his designee to administer the oath of office to the Honorable Joseph E. Brennan at Portland, Maine, on or after January 9, 1987.
